DOC.brief_summary: Persistence seroprotective antibody concentration & immunological memory show ability mount response challenge dose HBV vaccine
DOC.brief_title: Persistence Immune Response Hepatitis B 4-6 Years Old Children Previously Vaccinated With DTPa-HBV-IPV/Hib
DOC.criteria: A male female age 4 6 year time study entry . Subjects receive total 4 dos DTPaHBVIPV/Hib vaccine previous vaccination study . Evidence previous hepatitis B booster vaccination disease since administration fourth dose DTPaHBVIPV/Hib vaccine .
